mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.relationship_id AS "relationshipId", a.relation_key AS "relationKey", a.reg_work_unit_key AS "regWorkUnitKey", a.area_prop_key AS "areaPropKey", a.name AS "name", a.prepared_name AS "preparedName", a.group_key AS "groupKey", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.birth AS "birth", a.gender AS "gender", a.nation_key AS "nationKey", a.culture_key AS "cultureKey", a.political_key AS "politicalKey", a.religion_key AS "religionKey", a.merriage_key AS "merriageKey", a.insurance_key AS "insuranceKey", a.healthy_key AS "healthyKey", a.disable_level_key AS "disableLevelKey", a.occupation_key AS "occupationKey", a.work_unit_key AS "workUnitKey", a.lving_nature_key AS "lvingNatureKey", a.telphone AS "telphone", a.address AS "address", a.domicile AS "domicile", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.residence_key AS "residenceKey", a.residence_no AS "residenceNo", a.hobo_key AS "hoboKey", a.allowances_amount AS "allowancesAmount"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record_info( id, relationship_id, relation_key, reg_work_unit_key, area_prop_key, name, prepared_name, group_key, id_card, birth, gender, nation_key, culture_key, political_key, religion_key, merriage_key, insurance_key, healthy_key, disable_level_key, occupation_key, work_unit_key, lving_nature_key, telphone, address, domicile, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, residence_key, residence_no, hobo_key, allowances_amount ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{relationshipId}, #{relationKey}, #{regWorkUnitKey}, #{areaPropKey}, #{name}, #{preparedName}, #{groupKey}, #{idCard}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{nationKey}, #{cultureKey}, #{politicalKey}, #{religionKey}, #{merriageKey}, #{insuranceKey}, #{healthyKey}, #{disableLevelKey}, #{occupationKey}, #{workUnitKey}, #{lvingNatureKey}, #{telphone}, #{address}, #{domicile}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{residenceKey}, #{residenceNo}, #{hoboKey}, #{allowancesAmount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE record_info SET relationship_id = #{relationshipId}, relation_key = #{relationKey}, reg_work_unit_key = #{regWorkUnitKey}, area_prop_key = #{areaPropKey}, name = #{name}, prepared_name = #{preparedName}, group_key = #{groupKey}, id_card = #{idCard}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, nation_key = #{nationKey}, culture_key = #{cultureKey}, political_key = #{politicalKey}, religion_key = #{religionKey}, merriage_key = #{merriageKey}, insurance_key = #{insuranceKey}, healthy_key = #{healthyKey}, disable_level_key = #{disableLevelKey}, occupation_key = #{occupationKey}, work_unit_key = #{workUnitKey}, lving_nature_key = #{lvingNatureKey}, telphone = #{telphone}, address = #{address}, domicile = #{domicile}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, residence_key = #{residenceKey}, residence_no = #{residenceNo}, hobo_key = #{hoboKey}, allowances_amount = #{allowancesAmount} WHERE id = #{id}
